summary:
Ever felt like killing someone in your mod, but a sword just wasn't enough? I got a solution.

Modders Resource containing fully working gallows and trapdoors.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=orange][center]Description[/center][/color][/size][line]
[center]Ever felt like killing someone in your mod, but a sword just wasn't enough? I got a solution. Hang them! :D

Modder's Resource containing fully working gallows and trapdoors. [/center]


[color=orange][center][size=5]How To Use[/size]
[size=1]properly[/size][/center][/color][line]
[list=1][*][size=2]Download the main file and place it in your Skyrim/Data folder (or equivalent);[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Load your mod in the Creation Kit;[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Create a new object (I recommend duplicating an existing one with similar properties);[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]In the line "Model", click on "Edit". Click on "Edit" again and then choose your new model;[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Complete the rest of the object (Name, ID).[/size][/*]
[/list]

[size=5][color=orange][center]Mod Notes[/center][/color][/size][line]
There are 5 files packaged inside the download file:

[list][*][size=2][color=#f6b26b][b]Gallows01[/b][/color] - A complete gallows for a single hanging (1 Trapdoor Slot).[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][color=#b45f06][b]Gallows02End[/b][/color] - A 2-piece set for when you want to build extended gallows. This piece should be placed at the ends (1 Trapdoor Slot).[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][color=#f6b26b][b]Gallows02Middle[/b][/color] - A 2-piece set for when you want to build extended gallows. This piece should be placed in the middle (2 Trapdoor Slots).[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][color=#b45f06][b]GallowsStairs01[/b][/color] - Place the top right under the planks at the gallows' base. Check image section for a reference.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][color=#f6b26b][b]GallowsTrapdoorHalf01[/b][/color] - Half of a trapdoor. Place two opposite to each other to achieve full effect.*[/size][/*]
[*][color=#b45f06][b]GallowsTrapdoor01[/b][/color] - The full trapdoor! Fills a trapdoor slot completely.[/*]
[/list][size=2]
Animation for the Trapdoors is called "AnimOpen01" (string).

*NOTE: [s]Full trapdoor is being worked on, but skyrim just keeps refusing to play the animation. If you'd like to help with testing and developing this model please download the misc file in the downloads section.[/s] Trapdoor is finished! :D

NOTE: This resource only provides the gallows, to get help with hanging people check [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54860/?]here[/url].


[size=5][color=orange][center]Permissions[/center][/color][/size][line]
You're free to use these files in your mod as long as you pm me before! :D[/size]
author: Gandaganza

files.name: Gallows - Just Another Resource
files.changelogHtml: Full trapdoor? Fixed! Ganda out *drops mic*
